sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row>
    <v-col>
      <v-list
      >
        <v-tabs
            fixed-tabs
            slider-color="grey"
        >
          <v-tab
              v-for="(bg, i) in backgrounds"
              :key=i
              :class="{ active: i === activeTab }"
          >
            <v-subheader
                class="mt-2"
            >
              <v-icon class="mr-4">
                {{ bg.icon }}
              </v-icon>
              {{ bg.name }}
              <v-switch
                  class="ml-2"
              ></v-switch>
            </v-subheader>
          </v-tab>
        </v-tabs>
      </v-list>
      <v-list>
        <v-list-item>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-col>
  </v-row>
</template>
<!-- PREMIOS - FORMACION - EXP PROF -->
<!-- SUB GRUPO -->
<script>
export default {
  name: "ActorEditBackground",
  data: () => ({
    activeTab: null,
    backgrounds: [
      {
        name: 'Formacion',
        icon: 'mdi-school-outline',
        active: false
      },
      {
        name: 'Experiencia Profesional',
        icon: 'mdi-movie-open',
        active: false
      },
      {
        name: 'Premios',
        icon: 'mdi-trophy-award',
        active: false
      },
    ]
  }),
  props: {
    actorId: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
  },
  watch: {
    actorId: {
      handler: function () {
        this.retrieveBackgroundInfo();
      }
    }
  },
  methods:{
    retrieveBackgroundInfo(){
      console.log("todo bg info");
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
